alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 3:18PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Blaine, southwestern Power and northeastern Cassia Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 316 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Neeley, moving north northwest at 10 to 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, half inch hail, and heavy rain. Expect low visibility, especially on I-86. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Travel will be difficult on I-86 with low visibility and ponding of water. Locations impacted include... American Falls, Neeley, Rockland, Cold Water Rest Area and Massacre Rocks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region
